slra.lighting

Class PhongShader

  • java.lang.Object
    • slra.lighting.Shader
      • slra.lighting.PhongShader

  • public class PhongShader
extends Shader
    PhongShader class Allows the java program to update variables (uniforms) in the shader program. Shader based on Phong lighting model
    Author:
    Henry Valentine based on thebennybox 3D game Engine Tutorial

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhongShader

        public PhongShader()
        Calls superclass constructor. Creates and compiles GLSL shader Adds uniforms for the Phong shader. (Initializes them in the java program so the shader program equivalents may be updated)

    • Method Detail

      • updateUniforms

        public void updateUniforms(Matrix4f worldMatrix,
                           Matrix4f projectedMatrix,
                           Material material)
        This method updates the uniforms in the shader program. This is called for each mesh that is rendered so that its light interactions are accurately modeled.
        Specified by:
        updateUniforms in class Shader
        Parameters:
        worldMatrix - : Object's transformation
        projectedMatrix - : Projection transformation for object
        material - : Material of the object
